articles.description: BREAKING: Debutant wins spin shootout as record-breaking speedster snubbed for Ashes
articles.content:
Australia have unveiled their 15-player squad for the upcoming seven-game Womens Ashes series.
The uncapped Alana King has beaten out Amanda-Jade Wellington for the leg-spinners spot in the squad an… [+5479 chars]
